name: Vegas Crime Simulator 2
description:
Meet the grand map with tons of adventures. Get cash from your duties as a mafiosi right hand. Get hired as an urban shooter or strike criminals for police station.

Crazy casino everywhere, 24\7 alive city! Super stars poker clubs. Nice girls dancers. VEGAS atmosphere will keep you entertained.

Join russian roulette in the quests with no good choice. Get a jackpot for your gangman style. Feel the HEART of Vegas and share the rythm it beats.
